quiz.question: incogitant ______
quiz.explanation: 考虑不周的; 轻率的, 轻率的评论. His incogitant remark caused unnecessary offense. 他轻率的评论造成了不必要的冒犯。

quiz.question: concomitant _______
quiz.explanation: 伴随的; 同时发生的, 伴随的影响. The treatment has several concomitant effects. 这种治疗有几种伴随的影响。

quiz.question: precipitant ________
quiz.explanation: 沉淀剂; 仓促的, 添加沉淀剂. The precipitant addition caused the chemical reaction. 添加沉淀剂引起了化学反应。

quiz.question: unrepentant ______
quiz.explanation: 不悔改的; 顽固的, 不悔改的罪人. The unrepentant sinner refused to admit wrongdoing. 不悔改的罪人拒绝承认错误。

quiz.question: distant ________
quiz.explanation: 遥远的; 疏远的, 远房亲戚. She met a distant relative at the family reunion. 她在家庭聚会上遇见了一个远房亲戚。

quiz.question: constant ________
quiz.explanation: 恒定的; 不变的, 恒定速度. The object moved at constant velocity. 物体以恒定速度移动。

quiz.question: _____ extant
quiz.explanation: 现存的; 尚存的, 仍然现存的. The manuscripts are still extant in the library. 这些手稿仍然现存于图书馆中。

quiz.question: ________ sextant
quiz.explanation: 六分仪, 航海六分仪. Sailors use a nautical sextant to navigate by stars. 水手使用航海六分仪通过星星导航。

quiz.question: piquant ______
quiz.explanation: 辛辣的; 开胃的, 开胃的味道. The sauce has a piquant flavor that tingles the tongue. 这种酱汁有一种刺激舌头的开胃味道。

quiz.question: ______ truant
quiz.explanation: 逃学者, 逃学者. The school truant was caught by authorities. 逃学者被当局抓获。

quiz.question: _______ savant
quiz.explanation: 学者; 专家, 博学的学者. The learned savant published groundbreaking research. 博学的学者发表了开创性的研究。

quiz.question: flamboyant _____
quiz.explanation: 艳丽的; 炫耀的, 炫耀的风格. The artist is known for his flamboyant style. 这位艺术家以其炫耀的风格而闻名。

quiz.question: buoyant ______
quiz.explanation: 有浮力的; 活跃的, 活跃的市场. Investors are optimistic about the buoyant market. 投资者对活跃的市场持乐观态度。

quiz.question: ______ clairvoyant
quiz.explanation: 有透视能力的; 有洞察力的, 有天赋的千里眼. The gifted clairvoyant predicted future events. 有天赋的千里眼预测了未来事件。

quiz.question: cognizant __ ____
quiz.explanation: 认识到的; 察觉到的, 察觉到事实. Everyone should be cognizant of fact before deciding. 每个人在决定前都应该察觉到事实。

quiz.question: _______ bent
quiz.explanation: 倾向; 天赋, 天生的倾向. She has a natural bent for mathematics. 她对数学有天生的倾向。

quiz.question: recumbent ____
quiz.explanation: 斜躺的; 卧式的, 卧式自行车. He rides a recumbent bike for exercise. 他骑卧式自行车锻炼。

quiz.question: adjacent ____
quiz.explanation: 邻近的; 毗连的, 相邻的房间. The conference is in the adjacent room. 会议在相邻的房间里。

quiz.question: maleficent _____
quiz.explanation: 作恶的; 有害的, 邪恶的力量. The maleficent force threatened the kingdom. 邪恶的力量威胁着王国。

quiz.question: magnificent _____
quiz.explanation: 壮丽的; 宏伟的, 壮丽的景色. The mountain offers a magnificent vista of the valley. 山上提供了山谷的壮丽景色。

quiz.question: reticent _____
quiz.explanation: 沉默寡言的; 含蓄的, 含蓄的微笑. She gave a reticent smile and said nothing. 她露出含蓄的微笑,什么也没说。

quiz.question: nascent ________
quiz.explanation: 新生的; 初期的, 新兴产业. The nascent industry shows great potential. 新兴产业显示出巨大潜力。

quiz.question: renascent ________
quiz.explanation: 复兴的; 新生的, 复兴的产业. The renascent industry recovered from the recession. 复兴的产业从衰退中恢复过来。

quiz.question: ____ __ descent
quiz.explanation: 下降; 血统, 血统. He traced his line of descent back to royalty. 他追溯自己的血统到皇室。

quiz.question: iridescent ________
quiz.explanation: 彩虹色的; 色彩斑斓的, 彩虹色的羽毛. The bird displayed iridescent feathers in the sunlight. 鸟在阳光下展示彩虹色的羽毛。

quiz.question: quiescent _______
quiz.explanation: 静止的; 不活动的, 静止的火山. The quiescent volcano hasn't erupted in centuries. 静止的火山几个世纪没有爆发。

quiz.question: convalescent ____
quiz.explanation: 康复期的; 恢复健康的, 康复之家. He stayed at a convalescent home after surgery. 手术后他住在康复之家。

quiz.question: adolescent __________
quiz.explanation: 青春期的; 青少年, 青少年心理学. She specializes in adolescent psychology. 她专攻青少年心理学。

quiz.question: obsolescent ____
quiz.explanation: 即将过时的; 逐渐废弃的, 即将过时的技术. The obsolescent tech is being phased out. 即将过时的技术正在被淘汰。

quiz.question: evanescent ____
quiz.explanation: 短暂的; 逐渐消失的, 短暂的光辉. The evanescent glow faded at dusk. 短暂的光辉在黄昏时消退。

quiz.question: fluorescent _____
quiz.explanation: 荧光的, 荧光灯. The office uses fluorescent light for illumination. 办公室使用荧光灯照明。

quiz.question: __________ antecedent
quiz.explanation: 前情; 先例, 历史先例. The policy has a historical antecedent in earlier laws. 该政策在早期法律中有历史先例。

quiz.question: diffident _____
quiz.explanation: 缺乏自信的; 羞怯的, 羞怯的微笑. She gave a diffident smile when praised. 受到表扬时,她露出羞怯的微笑。

quiz.question: strident ____
quiz.explanation: 刺耳的; 尖锐的, 尖锐的语气. His strident tone made the argument worse. 他尖锐的语气使争论更糟。

quiz.question: resident _____
quiz.explanation: 居民; 常驻的, 外籍居民. As a resident alien, she has certain legal rights. 作为外籍居民,她享有某些法律权利。

quiz.question: _________ dissident
quiz.explanation: 持不同政见者, 政治异见者. The political dissident was imprisoned for his views. 政治异见者因其观点被监禁。

quiz.question: provident ____
quiz.explanation: 有远见的; 节俭的, 公积金. Workers contribute to a provident fund for retirement. 工人为退休缴纳公积金。

quiz.question: improvident ________
quiz.explanation: 无远见的; 浪费的, 无远见的支出. His improvident spending left him in debt. 他无远见的支出使他负债累累。

quiz.question: transcendent ______
quiz.explanation: 超越的; 卓越的, 超凡的美丽. The sunset displayed transcendent beauty. 日落展现了超凡的美丽。

quiz.question: resplendent _____
quiz.explanation: 华丽的; 灿烂的, 华丽的长袍. The king wore resplendent robes for the ceremony. 国王在典礼上穿着华丽的长袍。

quiz.question: pendent ______
quiz.explanation: 悬挂的; 下垂的, 吊灯. The pendent lights hung from the ceiling. 吊灯悬挂在天花板上。

quiz.question: indent _________
quiz.explanation: 缩进; 订货, 缩进段落. Remember to indent paragraph in formal writing. 记得在正式写作中缩进段落。

quiz.question: ____ despondent
quiz.explanation: 沮丧的; 泄气的, 感到沮丧. She began to feel despondent after repeated failures. 经过反复失败后,她开始感到沮丧。

quiz.question: ______ respondent
quiz.explanation: 被告; 答复者, 调查对象. Each survey respondent answered 20 questions. 每个调查对象回答了20个问题。

quiz.question: _______ correspondent
quiz.explanation: 记者; 通讯员, 外国记者. The foreign correspondent reported from the war zone. 外国记者从战区报道。

quiz.question: ardent _________
quiz.explanation: 热情的; 热烈的, 热情的支持者. She is an ardent supporter of environmental causes. 她是环境事业的热情支持者。

quiz.question: impudent ______
quiz.explanation: 无礼的; 放肆的, 无礼的评论. His impudent remark shocked everyone present. 他无礼的评论震惊了在场的所有人。

quiz.question: prudent ________
quiz.explanation: 谨慎的; 明智的, 谨慎的投资者. The prudent investor diversified his portfolio. 谨慎的投资者分散了他的投资组合。

quiz.question: imprudent ________
quiz.explanation: 不谨慎的; 轻率的, 轻率的决定. The imprudent decision cost the company millions. 轻率的决定让公司损失了数百万。

quiz.question: ________ reagent
quiz.explanation: 试剂, 化学试剂. The lab ordered a new chemical reagent for testing. 实验室订购了新的化学试剂用于测试。

quiz.question: _____ regent
quiz.explanation: 摄政者, 皇家摄政. The royal regent ruled until the prince came of age. 皇家摄政统治直到王子成年。

quiz.question: indigent ______
quiz.explanation: 贫困的; 贫穷的, 贫困的家庭. The charity helps indigent family with basic needs. 慈善机构帮助贫困家庭满足基本需求。

quiz.question: intransigent ______
quiz.explanation: 不妥协的; 固执的, 不妥协的立场. His intransigent stance prevented any compromise. 他不妥协的立场阻止了任何妥协。

quiz.question: exigent _____________
quiz.explanation: 紧急的; 迫切的, 紧急情况. The law allows exceptions for exigent circumstances. 法律允许在紧急情况下例外。

quiz.question: refulgent _____
quiz.explanation: 灿烂的; 辉煌的, 灿烂的光芒. The diamond sparkled with refulgent light. 钻石闪耀着灿烂的光芒。

quiz.question: effulgent _____
quiz.explanation: 光辉灿烂的, 光辉灿烂的光. The sunrise cast effulgent light across the sky. 日出在天空中投射出光辉灿烂的光。

quiz.question: plangent ____
quiz.explanation: 响亮的; 悲鸣的, 响亮的音调. The bell rang with a plangent tone. 钟声以响亮的音调响起。

quiz.question: stringent _____
quiz.explanation: 严格的; 严厉的, 严格的规则. The company enforces stringent rules for safety. 公司执行严格的安全规则。

quiz.question: astringent _____
quiz.explanation: 收敛的; 涩的, 收敛性化妆水. Use an astringent toner to minimize pores. 使用收敛性化妆水来缩小毛孔。

quiz.question: contingent _________
quiz.explanation: 可能发生的; 依情况而定的, 或有负债. The company disclosed contingent liability in its report. 公司在报告中披露了或有负债。

quiz.question: pungent _____
quiz.explanation: 刺激的; 辛辣的, 刺鼻的气味. The cheese has a pungent smell that's quite strong. 奶酪有一种相当浓烈的刺鼻气味。

quiz.question: cogent ________
quiz.explanation: 有说服力的; 令人信服的, 有说服力的论点. The lawyer presented a cogent argument to the jury. 律师向陪审团提出了有说服力的论点。

quiz.question: divergent _____
quiz.explanation: 分歧的; 不同的, 分歧的观点. The committee members held divergent views on the issue. 委员会成员对这个问题持有分歧的观点。

quiz.question: convergent _________
quiz.explanation: 趋同的; 会聚的, 趋同进化. Scientists study convergent evolution in different species. 科学家研究不同物种的趋同进化。

quiz.question: insurgent ______
quiz.explanation: 叛乱的; 起义者, 叛乱军队. The insurgent forces attacked the capital. 叛乱军队攻击了首都。

quiz.question: ______ proficient
quiz.explanation: 熟练的; 精通的, 非常熟练的. She is highly proficient in three languages. 她精通三种语言。

quiz.question: omniscient ________
quiz.explanation: 全知的, 全知叙述者. The novel uses an omniscient narrator perspective. 小说使用全知叙述者视角。

quiz.question: ___________ expedient
quiz.explanation: 权宜的; 方便的, 政治上权宜的. The decision was politically expedient but morally wrong. 这个决定在政治上是权宜之计,但在道德上是错误的。

quiz.question: inexpedient ____
quiz.explanation: 不适宜的; 不明智的, 不明智的举动. Raising taxes now would be an inexpedient move. 现在增税将是不明智的举动。

quiz.question: ______ ingredient
quiz.explanation: 成分; 要素, 活性成分. The active ingredient treats the infection effectively. 活性成分有效治疗感染。

quiz.question: salient _______
quiz.explanation: 显著的; 突出的, 显著特征. The report highlights the salient feature of the proposal. 报告强调了提案的显著特征。

quiz.question: resilient _______
quiz.explanation: 有弹性的; 有韧性的, 有韧性的经济. The resilient economy recovered quickly from the crisis. 有韧性的经济从危机中迅速恢复。

quiz.question: ____ emollient
quiz.explanation: 润肤的; 缓和的, 皮肤润肤剂. Apply skin emollient to dry areas daily. 每天在干燥区域涂抹皮肤润肤剂。

quiz.question: lenient ________
quiz.explanation: 宽大的; 仁慈的, 宽大的判决. The judge gave a lenient sentence to the first offender. 法官对初犯给予了宽大的判决。

quiz.question: sapient ______
quiz.explanation: 智慧的; 聪明的, 明智的选择. Hiring her proved to be a sapient choice. 雇用她被证明是明智的选择。

quiz.question: ___ recipient
quiz.explanation: 接受者; 受益人, 援助接受者. The aid recipient thanked the donors for their generosity. 援助接受者感谢捐赠者的慷慨。

quiz.question: incipient _____
quiz.explanation: 初期的; 开始的, 初期阶段. The disease was caught at an incipient stage. 疾病在初期阶段被发现。

quiz.question: oriental ___
quiz.explanation: 东方的, 东方地毯. The oriental rug added elegance to the room. 东方地毯为房间增添了优雅。

quiz.question: nutrient ______
quiz.explanation: 营养物; 营养的, 营养摄入. Monitor your daily nutrient intake for better health. 监测你的每日营养摄入以获得更好的健康。

quiz.question: transient _____
quiz.explanation: 短暂的; 临时的, 临时客人. The hotel caters to transient guest passing through. 酒店为路过的临时客人提供服务。

quiz.question: sentient _____
quiz.explanation: 有感觉的; 有知觉的, 有知觉的生命. All sentient being deserve compassion and respect. 所有有知觉的生命都值得同情和尊重。

quiz.question: insentient ______
quiz.explanation: 无感觉的; 无生命的, 无生命的物质. Rocks are insentient matter without consciousness. 岩石是无意识的无生命物质。

quiz.question: ambivalent ________
quiz.explanation: 矛盾的; 模棱两可的, 矛盾的态度. She has an ambivalent attitude toward the proposal. 她对这个提案持有矛盾的态度。

quiz.question: ____________ equivalent
quiz.explanation: 等价的; 相等的, 数学等式. The two expressions are mathematical equivalent. 这两个表达式在数学上是等价的。

quiz.question: pestilent _______
quiz.explanation: 瘟疫的; 有害的, 瘟疫性疾病. The pestilent disease spread rapidly through the city. 瘟疫性疾病在城市中迅速传播。

quiz.question: repellent ____
quiz.explanation: 令人厌恶的; 防护的, 令人厌恶的气味. The garbage gave off a repellent odor. 垃圾散发出令人厌恶的气味。

quiz.question: redolent __ _____
quiz.explanation: 芳香的; 使人想起的, 散发玫瑰香气. The garden air was redolent of roses in bloom. 花园的空气散发着盛开玫瑰的香气。

quiz.question: indolent _________
quiz.explanation: 懒惰的; 无痛的, 懒散的生活方式. His indolent lifestyle led to health problems. 他懒散的生活方式导致了健康问题。

quiz.question: somnolent _____
quiz.explanation: 困倦的; 催眠的, 困倦状态. The medication left him in a somnolent state. 药物使他处于困倦状态。

quiz.question: benevolent ______
quiz.explanation: 仁慈的; 善意的, 仁慈的领导者. The benevolent leader cared deeply for his people. 仁慈的领导者深切关心他的人民。

quiz.question: turbulent _____
quiz.explanation: 动荡的; 骚乱的, 动荡的时期. The nation survived turbulent times of war and upheaval. 国家在战争和动荡的动荡时期幸存下来。

quiz.question: truculent ____
quiz.explanation: 好斗的; 残暴的, 好斗的语气. His truculent tone escalated the disagreement. 他好斗的语气使分歧升级。

quiz.question: fraudulent ______
quiz.explanation: 欺诈的; 欺骗性的, 欺诈计划. Investigators uncovered a fraudulent scheme to steal money. 调查人员揭露了一个欺诈计划来窃取金钱。

quiz.question: opulent _______
quiz.explanation: 富裕的; 豪华的, 豪华的豪宅. The billionaire lived in an opulent mansion. 亿万富翁住在豪华的豪宅里。

quiz.question: corpulent ____
quiz.explanation: 肥胖的, 肥胖的身体. His corpulent body made movement difficult. 他肥胖的身体使行动困难。

quiz.question: virulent ______
quiz.explanation: 剧毒的; 恶毒的, 剧毒的病毒株. Scientists study the virulent strain of the disease. 科学家研究该疾病的剧毒病毒株。

quiz.question: __ _ predicament
quiz.explanation: 困境; 窘境, 处于困境. She found herself in a predicament with no easy solution. 她发现自己处于没有简单解决方案的困境中。

quiz.question: ____ filament
quiz.explanation: 细丝; 灯丝, 细丝. The spider spun a fine filament web. 蜘蛛编织了一张细丝网。

quiz.question: ______ tournament
quiz.explanation: 锦标赛; 联赛, 网球锦标赛. She competed in the tennis tournament last weekend. 她上周末参加了网球锦标赛。

quiz.question: ____ sacrament
quiz.explanation: 圣礼; 圣事, 神圣的圣礼. The priest administered the holy sacrament. 牧师主持了神圣的圣礼。
